string.value: I lost the #t1912005# for Mounts. What should I do...? I better talk to #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainerk# for help.

#p1102002# told me because of budget issues, he couldn't give me a spare #t1912005#, and told me I must come up with a new #t1912005# on my own... It is rumored that #p2060005# of #m230000000# is a great maker of #t1912005#s... but I have a feeling it's going to be very expensive. I'll have to bring the materials and the service charge for the #t1912005# to #p2060005#.
I handed #p2060005# the materials for #t1912005#, along with the service charge, and received #t1912005# in return. I better make sure not to lose #t1912005# ever again.

What is it? Hmmm...? You lost #t1912005#? Hmmm... that's not good. You can't Mount without #t1912005#. Hmmm? You want another one? Well... we have a tight budget right now, and we cannot give out extra #t1912005#s to those who've lost theirs. There are other knights out there... and as you know, #p1101002# is not one to extend budget on something like this...

But, that doesn't mean there's absolutely no way you can get another #t1912005#. You should make one yourself, no? All #t1912005#s are custom-made by #b#p2060005##k of #b#m230000000##k, so if you give him the materials for #t1912005# along with some money, you'll be able to get yourself a new #t1912005#. It won't be cheap by any means, but... that's the only way you'll be able to get #t1912005#.
Bring #b200 #t4000030#s#k, #b200 #t4000055#s#k, #b200 #t4000171#s#k... and #b5 million mesos#k to #p2060005#, and you'll be able to get yourself a new #t1912005#. Best of luck to you.
Hmmm... that's unfortunate. You'll just have to use #t1902005# as an accessory.

Hmmm? What is it that you need? I see that you're carrying a hefty amount of leather... WHAT? You want me to build a new #t1912005#? That won't be too difficult, but I have other work to do, so... I can't build one for you for free. What? You brought some money as well? In that case, I'll try my best to make one as soon as possible. Just give me the materials first!
Here's #t1912005#! Hope to see you again!
Haven't you met with #p2060005# yet? Make sure to bring #b200 #t4000030#s#k, #b200 #t4000055#s#k, #b200 #t4000171#s#k... and #b5 million mesos#k to #p2060005#.
Hmm... what is it? You don't look too happy. Wait, you have #t1902005#, but you don't have #t1912005# with you.
